title: The Client is Busted
body: The League of Legends client is completely broken. Every few games the client either shuts down out of nowhere or stops responding. I have lost a ton of LP from the client crashing, and it's starting to get extremely bothersome. I have repaired my files and that didn't fix it. The client was working perfectly fine quite some time ago, but it's breaking a lot now.

replies.body: It seems like your client isn't able to maintain a strong connection, and will ultimately kick you out upon a disconnection.  I recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to hel pget this fixed.  If you still have any issues, give me some more details about what is happening exactly and more specific, along with any error messages.   Let me know!
